summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of North 50th Street and North 49th Street, each from Fremont Avenue to Stone Way; North 48th Street, North 47th Street, and North 46th Street, each from Fremont Avenue to Interlake Avenue; Fremont Avenue, Linden Avenue, Aurora Avenue, Whitman Avenue, and Woodland Park Avenue, each from North 45th Street to North 50th Street, all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks, together with all necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 879 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
